title: Bloomberg Markets: Mayweather-McGregor Fight Knockout for Vegas

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Brian Egger Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing how the Mayweather-McGregor fight will be a knockout for Vegas, media & MGM.
